pageTitle: Prime Minister Trudeau meets with President John Mahama of the Republic of Ghana | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with President John Mahama of the Republic of Ghana on the margins of the Commonwealth Heads of Government Meeting.

Prime Minister Trudeau reaffirmed Ghana's place as one of Canada's oldest development partners and welcomed closer relations between both countries.

Both leaders underscored the importance of their bilateral relationship, including closer economic ties and advancement of the Mutual Accountability Framework signed by both governments in April 2015.
